extendedInfo.description: Introducing people to events and events to people! Share plans with your friends and find the best events in your neighborhood!"Best event app 2012" - Android MagazineFeatures: - Eventphant recommends Events matching to you! - Connect to Facebook to arrange with friends and never miss a private Party again (optional) - Events in your neighborhood or at any place in the world - No tedious searching on different sites - Eventphant knows them all! - Sharing of events on Facebook and Twitter - Save events on your calender and do not miss anything again - Detailed information directly from the original website - View as list or map - Navigate to the event - Check whatâs going on today or plan your weekendhttps://www.facebook.com/Eventphanthttp://gplus.to/Eventphanthttps://twitter.com/#!/Eventphantdesigned by Liechtenecker.atTags: events, current events, recent events, upcoming events, world events, party, concerts, event search, club, bar, nightlife, what's on, agenda, music, festivals, social, personalized, entertainment, bands, event collection

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Always says \"checking version\". I\'m in Germany, Samsung Galaxy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Can\'t establish a connection with the server and app crashes on maps since i updated. I\'m using CM9 on sgs
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: best app for event search
reviews.comment: finds very many events from different sites - the best tool for planning the evenings. very fast and intuitive.
reviews.author: A Google User
